scriptsComment: scripts.start will start both the client and server projects TOGETHER on SEPARATE ports.  scripts.install will enable us to pull down from git and run yarn on the command line from the root dir, saving us from having to go into each project individually

scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && PORT=3000 yarn start" "cd server && PORT=3001 yarn start"
